title: Macroeconomics 19th Edition- McConnell, Brue, Flynn [Epub &
description:
Macroeconomics 19th Edition
Authors: Sean Flynn, Campbell McConnell and Stanley Brue
Published: 2013 (ebook), 2011 (paperback)
Publisher: McGraw-Hill
ISBN: 9780077337728
Edition: US
Format: Epub and Retail Mobi 
Readers: Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle App, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Tested on PC and Android tablet.
Note: In the title pages (not the book itself) there are a couple of graphs that are very hard to read. The graphs have random statistics for the cost of goods and services from 1956-1982. From what I can tell, they are for information purposes only and don't form part of the book itself. It's retail mobi, so if you're happy with that then download and save yourself $157.27 :D
Does not include access to Connect Plus (one-off code).
______________________________________________________________________________

McConnell, Brue, and FlynnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Economics: Principles, Problems, and Policies is the #1 Principles of Economics textbook in the world. It continues to be innovative while teaching students in a clear, unbiased way. The 19th Edition builds upon the tradition of leadership by sticking to 3 main goals: Help the beginning student master the principles essential for understanding the 
economizing problem, specific economic issues, and the policy alternatives; help the student understand and apply the economic perspective and reason accurately and objectively about economic matters; and promote a lasting student interest in economics and the economy.
